mean_cn: adj. 催眠的；  n. 安眠药
mean_en: causing a person to become tired and ready to fall asleep
word_etyma: sopor睡眠+ific表形容词，产生...的 →安眠药
short_phrase: The baby finds airplanes to be soporific.
sentence: My baby's no trouble on planes - he finds them soporific and mostly takes a nap.
sentence_trans: 我的宝宝坐飞机时不会是个麻烦，他发现飞机很催眠，大多数时候都会睡觉。
